resources.string: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time, W-2 employment).

Highly talented full stack iOS and Java software developer offering over 13 years of outstanding hands on experience in the software development industry. Proven, dedicated history of designing and implementing all aspects of enterprise solutions, using modern SDLC methodologies, effective coding skills, and an in-depth knowledge of industry best practices.
